author: kevaundray
content: Currently the prover pubkey needs to be a validator public key yep -- we agreed to explore this more in the future; I left a comment here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/4885#issuecomment-3828878893

author: manunlp
content:
Thanks. Actually it's written here:
> [REJECT] `proof.prover_pubkey` is associated with an active validator.
